entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error with sign XML exception "Cryptography_Xml_CreateHashAlgorithmFailed" in iOS .net 8 #102033
  • [API Proposal]: Provide control over growth rate of AsnWriter #102031
  • arm32 fails in CI with "/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.34' not found" #102030
  • Application Not Looking in Working Directory for .NET #102028
  • DynamicallyAccessedMembers attribute ignored on generic attribute when publishing for AOT #102023
  • Remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure in dotnet linux #102018
  • Dependency injection does not respect unmanaged constraint #102016
  • BinaryFormatter PayloadReader API #102014
    9.0.0
  • Strange JMP over NOP in try-catch-finally #102013
  • Blazor WASM: breakpoints on property setter not hit #102012
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT][API Proposal]: Provide an API to transfer JS objects between main browser thread and JSWebWorker contexts #102011
  • [NativeAOT] Static lib linking looking for dynamic lib in linux #102020
  • [browser][mt] JSWebWorker crashes the runtime #102010
  • Mono is calling derived class function instead of base class function when base's function is invoked using delegate. #102009
  • ILLink: Preserve implementation for default static interface methods #102008
  • JsonConverter fails with nullable enums. #102006

Closed

  • Error with sign XML exception in iOS .net 8 #102032
  • Assertion failed '(constIndexOffset % elemSize) == 0' #67870
    9.0.0
  • .NET 9 Runtime Async Experiment #94620
    9.0.0
  • Reflection does not respect unmanaged constraint #102017
  • [API Proposal]: `ValueTask.ConfigureAwait(ConfigureAwaitOptions)` #102019
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NETClients/IDispatch/NETClientIDispatch/NETClientIDispatch.cmd #101959
  • icudt_EFIGS.dat is never recognized by Blazor #101992
    9.0.0
  • C# compiler generates highly suboptimal code for compound assignments with struct ref variables #100008
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/RefFields/Validate/Validate.cmd #101964
  • Test failure: GC\\API\\GCHandle\\Alloc\\Alloc.cmd #101961
    9.0.0
  • ARM32 Year 2038 issue #96460
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin arm image to unblock ci #102035
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • [mono] Use simdhash for aot method lookup ptr->methodinfo cache #102029
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add more issue links to trimmer assertions #102027
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ILLink: Add PropertyNode for dependency analysis #102026
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Expand optRelopImpliesRelop for constants as op1 #102024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math Fused* APIs #102007
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve

Merged

  • Remove ThreadNative_GetProcessDefaultStackSize #102003
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Small followup to Use QueueUserAPC2 for EE suspension on CoreCLR win-arm64 #102021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update SPMI collection script for ASP.NET #102025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Merging some similar SVE formats into `SVE_AT_3A` #101958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Profile AOT: Relax is_local_inst to let more methods qualified for AOT compilation #101987
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update area owners #102022
    area-Meta
  • Use QueueUserAPC2 for EE suspension on CoreCLR win-arm64. #101891
    arch-arm64, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #101725
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo #102015
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Move issue links from comments to the warning attributes in trimming tests. #101819
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Explicitly link against the dotnet/llvm-project libc++ #102001
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove O1K_VALUE_NUMBER #101894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold nullchecks in Interlocked.* #101956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Partially revert "Disable msvc vectorization in GC get_promoted_bytes (#100309)" #101995
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Declare __cxa_demangle where it's used based on the Itanium ABI instead of including the ABI header. #101997
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport crossgen2 changes) #101869
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable AVX512 embedded masking for most other intrinsics #101886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Read types from contract descriptor #101994
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Visit switch successors in increasing likelihood order for RPO-based layout #101935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT CSE Optimization - Add a gymnasium environment for reinforcement learning #101856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 1 #101950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add custom mmap/munmap implementation for anonymous mappings #101871
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove snapcraft files #101768
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Utilize new APIs in the WebSocket implementation #101953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Remove defensive copies in `System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext` #101161
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • WIP: another workaround for hardcoded compiler versions #100828
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Exclude dependabot from community-contribution labeling #101742
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named DOTNET_GCPath #101874
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Support SV48 Virtual Memory Layout #101966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Simplify some non-generic CompareTo methods #101545
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Make debug logs with string literals that create garbage conditional #101986
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use classes rather than records for parts of the incremental pipeline in interop generators and hide constructors #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debug breakpoint step over throws an access violation exception #73389
  • F1 on type parameter symbols declared in source opens MSDN at completely unrelated pages #73388
  • VB Span Perf Issue #73387
  • Errors for scoped differences in override indexers are missing in some cases #73384

Closed

  • CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #73304
    17.11
  • Hot Reload fails with "ENC1002: The given key <assembly> was not present in the dictionary." #67497
  • Collection expression IL could be simplified for single span element #72566
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Use null for diagnostic ExpandedMessage so the client falls back appropriately #73395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add dummy type to SemanticSearch.ReferenceAssemblies #73390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove compile-time dependency from Workspace.MSBuild on Workspace.MSBuild.BuildHost #73393
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Provide solution methods to allow updating a bulk set of documents at once. #73394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Run phases of code cleanup in parallel #73386
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with improper formatting in introduce-variable #73392
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fixup improper parenthesized expression in 'use pattern combinators'. #73391
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do syntactic cleanup during the initial pass of producing fixed documents in fix-all. #73383
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Add asterisk based assembly version docs #73364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Share fix-all code #73385
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Have code refactoring tests run in OOP mode by default #73381
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Have code action tests run in OOP mode by default #73372
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary project reference to System.Text.Json #73370
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update partial properties feature branch from main #73377
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73379
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add dynamic registration for razor and cshtml files #73369
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: basic indexer scenarios and signature mismatch diagnostics #73378
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: workaround for empty display class #73366
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Continue visiting bad named argument if not target-typed in NullableWalker #73326
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix overload resolution regression around params parameters #73373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Run final fix-all code-cleanup phase out of process. #73357
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove IsCompatBreakingFeatureEnabled method #73371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.11

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpRequest.BodyReader.TryRead returns false even though request has a body #55615
  • ASP.NET 8 + ANGULAR Template with Docker breaks the SPA proxy #55614
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55610
  • Perf improvement: json #55609
  • Blazor EditForm Enhance=True with StreamRendering #55608
  • FileStreamResult resulting in significantly more I/O than client is requesting #55606
  • Add documentation for AuthenticateResult.Fail failureMessage parameter. #55602
    Backlog
  • Blazor hot reloading not working with referenced assembly #55601
  • Kestrel will not accept new connection. #55599
  • close connection after HEAD handler executed #55598
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55596
  • New Project Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Garnet #55593

Closed

  • Crash due to INVALID_POINTER_READ_c0000005_aspnetcorev2_inprocess.dll!STRU::SafeVsnwprintf #54673
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, single_query, updates #55561
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json_spring #55570
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #55607
  • Results.Json(null) stopped producing a response body in .NET 8 (and 7) #53509
  • How to get access token in Blazor server with Azure B2C #55578
  • Checkbox input tag helper throws FormatException: 1 is not a valid value for Boolean #55512
  • Meaningless error when using both Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect 8.0.4 and System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt 7.5.0 or higher #55194
  • OpenIdConnect .well-known/openid-configuration partially read #55355
  • Garnet Microsoft.Extensions.Caching “ERR unknown command” #55594
  • Add HttpConnectAttribute #52380
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55589
  • Error "InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains more than one matching element" in Swagger when using minimal api with the header versioning #54623
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Stop retrying template tests #55605
    * NO MERGE *
  • [Blazor] Avoid validating antiforgery for non form data content types #55604
    area-blazor
  • Fix flaky CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState test variations #55603
    area-blazor
  • Covariant THub-Parameter #55600
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Fix typo in IUserClaimStore.cs #55547
    area-identity, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `77afe8e` to `d83fee1` #55448
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `44db12e` to `1c23eb1` #55449
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/2.1] Stop using -pt images #55463
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Adds static asset endpoints, serve compressed assets #55558
    area-blazor
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #55229
    area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 9.0-preview5
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HybridWebView: Support controlling F12 browser dev tools #22305
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView: Add support for JavaScript to invoke C# methods #22304
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView: Add support for C# to invoke JavaScript methods #22303
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HybridWebView core features: static files and simple messages #22302
    .NET 9 Planning
  • IntelliSense for XAML is not working correctly in Visual Studio Code. #22301
  • In the project properties, the Custom Entitlements is missing .NET MAUI #22299
  • Strange behavior on MAUI WebAuthenticator for android #22296
  • Windows AppShell Title is overlaying on itself #22292
    Backlog
  • In Android, Property Changed not propagating to the view the FIRST time but ok every subsequent attempt #22291
    Backlog
  • InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls on Android #22289
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] Rotate the simulator and the page is truncated #22288
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Testing] Enable CarouselViewVirtualViewNotNull test on all platforms and fix related CarouselView issues #22287
    Backlog
  • The iOS keyboard is not fully retracted and requires an extra click on the “Done” button #22286
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Crash on Android when hold app over 2 minutes in background #22284

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] [iOS] [SDK 17] Touch events are not working on WebView when a PDF is displayed. #18716
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Mouse selection broken with the FluentUI package from MAUI > 8.0.7 #22297
  • [Windows] Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22000
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Windows] App crashes when rectangle sized by a Grid has a size of 1 on 125% scale screen #22003
    .NET 8 SR5
  • MediaStore query on Android returns 0 items with Android API 33 and 34. Generated manifest file in .NET 8 targets 29 although it should target 34 #22285
  • 8.0.21 update breaks android label wrap feature which causes other controls exceeding layout borders #22083
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Optimization can be disabled by setting the PublishTrimmed property to false. (NETSDK1144) (UNMC) #21999
  • Vertical Scrolling in ScrollView Orientation = "BOTH" is not working [Android] #22133

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert ios button changes #22300
    area/controls 🎮
  • Reuse/share the Button RippleDrawable logic with ImageButton #22298
    area/controls 🎮
  • Don't include removed projects #22294

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview4] Update versions for preview4 #22293
  • Remove excess check in iOS input transparency checks #21883
  • [Windows] Avoid Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • Shape crash on 125% display size #22283
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/cat 😻
  • Don't push to maestro by default #22295
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [build] make `TrimMode=full` function like NativeAOT #22282
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #22234
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area/collectionview 📃
  • fix: fix 22183 RadioButton checked value #22186
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Enforce CA1854 performance analyzer #22100
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR6
  • Trigger remeasure when constraints on CV changes #22270
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, Backlog
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Facing issues with the Entry, DatePicker, and CheckBox components when applying themes - Fix #21826
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, control-picker
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [UI Test] Update Appium to 5.0.0-rc.8 #22117
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-switch, testing-flakiness

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Explain why triggers aren't working after adding the following migration #33691
  • Support `HasConversion` to primitive collection types #33688
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: removing a value from an owned collection leaves the change tracker in a bad state #33687
    Backlog

Closed

  • TimeOnly.FromDateTime() could not be translated in EF Core 8 #33678
    9.0.0
  • Boolean property with default '1' not working #33683
  • Correct approach to one DBContext, multiple versions of the same Database. #33690

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #33678 - TimeOnly.FromDateTime() could not be translated in EF Core 8 #33689

Updated

  • Fix to #33547 - Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33559

entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove unused files #19707
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #19708
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #19692
